title: Textile, ca. 1760
medium:
Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave
description: Handblocked textile in an incomplete floral pattern in madder colors of red and brown of floral sprays. Elaborate picotage background in red, and in sepia, a picotage design of windmill and flowers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, ca. 1760.
ca. 1760. Medium: linen warp, cotton weft
Technique: block printed on plain weave. Gift of Harold M. Bailey. 1960-79-1-a.
